ValidationRule.description: This rule ensures that a fact find is not completed manually by a user.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL( OW_review_fact_find_status__c, "Complete" )
&&
ISCHANGED( OW_review_fact_find_status__c )
&&
ISBLANK( OW_completed_by_client__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot mark the review fact find complete manually. This will be done automatically when the customer submits their response.
